description:
Super Mario Bros. with a 35-player twist

Race against time, defeat enemies,and sabotage your opponents in an online*battle to be the last Mario standing! 

Play for no additional cost with a Nintendo Switch Online membership

Super Mario Bros.™35 joins the roster of games available exclusively for Nintendo Switch Online members. Join the 35-player action and enjoy daily missions, leaderboards,and in-game rewards!

Classic Super Mario Bros. gameplay gets an adrenaline boost!Each player is given the same timed stage, but you must defeat enemies to earn extra time and attack your opponents. Don’t forget to pick up some coins on your way—they can be used to get in-game items like power-ups. With speed, skill, and strategy,you could be the last Mario standing. 

Check in often—there are Daily Challenges and Special Battles to enjoy as you go Mario vs. Mario vs. Mario vs. Mario vs. Mario vs...(err, you get the idea).

Participation in online matches may result in your nickname and game stats being shared within the game or in promotional activity. This game is playable until March 31, 2021.
name: Super Mario Bros.™ 35
